name: GamerzClass ApS
description: Provider of an online gaming platform intended to create step-by-step programs that improve gaming skills. The company's platform offers online courses, produces and sells learning material for e-sport players while also offering video courses in professional sports games that are developed in collaboration with leading players, enabling gamers to learn efficiently and improve their gaming experience.
one_liner: Provider of an online gaming platform intended to create step-by-step programs that improve gaming skills. The company's platform offers online courses, produces and sells learning material for e-sport players while also offering video courses in professional sports games that are developed in collaboration with leading players, enabling gamers to learn efficiently and improve their gaming experience.
